name: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich
name_original: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich
description:
Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich is a 2D action platforming game! Players assume the role of CN000, a prototype cybernetic ninja made for the sole purpose of destroying The Third Reich. Infiltrate a Nazi military base and decimate their forces from within in this throwback to the 16 bit side scrolling glory days!

  • 2D Side Scrolling Action
  • Arcade Style Gameplay
  • 12 Challenging Levels
  • 4 Difficulty Modes
  • Original Chiptune Soundtrack

Get ready to kick some Nazi ass!!!
